ygData.subject: Re: New Bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: no idea since i depend on dodge and only wear leather and woven ... From: Steve Fogle [mailto:steve.fogle@catapultsystems.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
no idea since i depend on dodge and only wear leather and woven

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Fogle [mailto:steve.fogle@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:22 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>

Thanks,

So is a Wood Elf the best race for a Bard? I have heard that strength is
important for certain types of armor? Is this not that big of deal?

Thanks,
Steve

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 2:16 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

Well here are my thoughts...

Put 10 in Dex, 5 in Int, and the rest in Agi

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Fogle [mailto:steve.fogle@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 1:18 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: Steve Fogle <steve.fogle@...>

Okay, I'm new to this list....

I want to start a new Bard. It looks like the Wood Elf is the best race for
a bard. My question is, how should I spend my 25pts?

Thanks for the info,

Steve
